snippet: Reading from a script in an update on the transition, the president-elect struck a softer tone, avoiding topics like terrorism and immigration....
abstract: Pres-elect Donald Trump releases social media video in which he claims his transition is running smoothly; reads from script in direct-to-camera message and promises to create jobs, renegotiate agreements on trade, end regulations on energy production and put in place bans on lobbying; video offers one of few opportunities for public to hear from Trump since he was elected.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS

lead_paragraph: Reading from a script in an update on the transition, the president-elect struck a softer tone, avoiding topics like terrorism and immigration.

headline.main: Trump, on YouTube, Pledges to Create Jobs
headline.print_headline: Trump, on Video, Says Transition Runs Smoothly
